package.name: antibot3
package.install:
cd ${PKGNAME} mkdir -p -m 0755 ${TGTDIR}/etc/avira mkdir -p -m 0755 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/antibot3/icons mkdir -p -m 0755 ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin mkdir -p -m 0755 ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications
for f in *.css *.js *.png *.txt ; do install -m 0644 $f ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/antibot3 done for f in *.rb *.sh ; do install -m 0755 $f ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/antibot3 done for f in switch2assistant.sh switch2desktop.sh ; do install -m 0755 $f ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin done install -m 0755 avupdate ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/antibot3 install -m 0644 scancl.conf ${TGTDIR}/etc/avira install -m 0644 avupdate.conf ${TGTDIR}/etc/avira install -m 0644 avupdate.conf.cbavgui ${TGTDIR}/etc/avira cd icons for f in *.png ; do install -m 0644 $f ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/lesslinux/antibot3/icons done
cat > ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/applications/switch2assistant.desktop << DESKTOP
